badges.label: Known Data-Gap
badges.description: This does not include cooling impacts from sulphur dioxide and aerosols, so the net warming can be lower.

badges.label: Open Data
badges.description: Underlying dataset is publicly available for download.

badges.label: Aggregated Data
badges.description: CO₂, CH₄, and N₂O emissions are aggregated by fossil versus agriculture/land origins, which conceals individual gas-source trajectories in favour of total warming impact.

badges.label: Uncertainty Not Visualized
badges.description: The displayed curves are deterministic; statistical or methodological uncertainty in attributing temperature change is not communicated to viewers.

badges.label: CC BY License
badges.description: Our World in Data permits reuse with attribution, explicitly encouraging redistribution and derivative work by others.
